name: Sound dominator
description:
Based on the original  Soundodger game

Avoid all the projectiles in this fast-paced, music - syncing(slightly) game.

A 100% score is near impossible to get but can you do it?

Controls: use Mouse or finger to drag circle around and avoid the obstacles.

(Music is not available for 2 levels currently but it will be coming soon)

This game was made for the Music game JAM (2018)

>>The game works on Google chrome and Firefox.

>>Doesn't work on Safari or IE.

>>Created in pure html, CSS and javascript (No game engines or frameworks)
